programme.desc: Blanche, Dorothy and Sophia cheer up a hospitalized Rose after she becomes ill at a crashed class reunion.

programme.desc: Optimistic and cheerful TV producer Kelly doesn't have time for love. Bad boy celebrity chef Stephen doesn't have time for anything besides cooking. Fun with a side of love ensues as Kelly and Stephen are paired on a children's cooking show.

programme.desc: Two talented chefs, exact opposites in culinary style and personality, find themselves competing on a cable cooking show.
